thread.title: `Obessed` Julia Roberts reveals hubby is her stylist
thread.title_full: `Obessed` Julia Roberts reveals hubby is her stylist

author: NewsWire
title: `Obessed` Julia Roberts reveals hubby is her stylist
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
Washington D.C., Oct.12 (ANI): Julia Roberts seems to be completely smitten by her husband Danny Moder as she has revealed that she wears the outfits picked by her husband. 
While attending the star-studded Hammer Museum Gala in the Garden, California, the 47-year-old actress revealed that she was wearing a Bottega Veneta dress picked by ‘The Normal Heart’ actor, People magazine reports. 
The actress further said that the 46-year-old cinematographer was double minded over the ensemble he chose and another possibility, but said the dress and blazer combo he chose in the end “was better.” 
Roberts and Danny Moder, who tied the knot on July 4, 2002, are parents to twins Finn and Hazel and to 8 year-old Henry. (ANI) Related Posts
